## GoogleAdditionalInformationQuestions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GoogleAdditionalInformationQuestions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [alcoholAndTobaccoRelatedContent?](./stentor-models.googleadditionalinformationquestions.alcoholandtobaccorelatedcontent.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> From the copy of the question:<!-- -->Do your Actions contain alcohol or tobacco-related content? If yes, you must include age verification at the beginning of the conversation. If your Actions mainly sell alcohol or tobacco, you must implement account linking and verify that the user meets legal age requirements. |
|  [intendedForUnderThirteen?](./stentor-models.googleadditionalinformationquestions.intendedforunderthirteen.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> From the copy of the question:<!-- -->Are children under the age of 13 one of the intended audiences of your Actions? If yes, you must join the Actions for Families program. The Actions for Families program allows developers to designate that their Actions are family-friendly, so parents and kids can find trusted, high-quality content more easily on the Google Assistant. |
